Header: Body of Lankan student to be brought back from Russia
Content: The body of a Sri Lankan student who was killed in a fire in the hostel of a Russian university, will be brought back to the country on Sunday, May 3. The student, who was in a critical condition following the fire on April 24,  succumbed to his injuries on the 28. The victim was a twenty-tw0-year old named Mihira Uvindu Wijerama – a resident of Kalutara and  a past student of Panadura Sri Sumangala Vidyalaya, and Ananda College, Colombo. Uvindu completed his G.C.E. A/L in the Bio stream and obtained a scholarship to continue his higher studies at the National Medical Research Institute in Moscow.
